name.description: Internal identifier for the board (used in file names and references).

displayName.description: Name shown to players when viewing or listing boards.

description.description: Brief description of the board's purpose and content.

permanent.description: If true, the board persists indefinitely. If false, it expires after expirationMs.

expirationMs.description: Time in milliseconds after which a non-permanent board expires (0 = no expiration).

writePermission.description: Permission level required to post messages on this board.

nextMessageId.description: The next message ID to assign when a new message is posted (must be at least 0).
